column4: Is it possible to use kdm to log in to Gnome session? I'm planning to set up a multiseat but the the new gdm doesn't seem to support multisessions but kdm does. The problem is that I don't want to use KDE as desktop environment. I qant the default Gnom desktop.
yeah there should be a dropdown menu somewhere on there
I originally installed kubuntu and then ubuntu-desktop for gnome, and I was able to get into gnome :)
